text:
Elektrobit Automotive | Car and mobility developers | Oulu, Finland | Full-time, onsite | https://www.elektrobit.com/

Elektrobit is building car of the future! We are now offering exciting career opportunities in growing automotive business at every career level. EB Automotive Finland is established three years ago, and today we have over one hundred software professionals working with us. We are growing steadily and have openings for various AWESOME CAR AND MOBILITY DEVELOPER roles in our appreciated technology site located in Oulu Technology Village.

Please apply here: https://jobs.elektrobit.com/Car-and-Mobility-Developers-Oulu...

Also looking for Expert and Senior Java developers: - https://jobs.elektrobit.com/EXPERT-JAVA-DEVELOPER-OULU-eng-j... - https://jobs.elektrobit.com/SENIOR-JAVA-DEVELOPER-OULU-eng-j...
